'''Mount''' may refer to:
== ''Minecraft'' ==
* [[Riding]] &ndash; a mechanic where a [[mob]] such as a [[player]] rides another.
* [[Mounts of Mayhem]] &ndash; a [[game drop]] adding the [[nautilus]], [[zombie horse]], and [[camel husk]] mounts.
* [[Jockey]] &ndash; a mob riding another mob.

== ''Minecraft Legends'' ==
* [[Legends:Mount|Mount]] &ndash; a type of [[Legends:Mob|mob]] that can be ridden by the player.
